abstract: Indian farmers demanding government benefits to offset harsh economic conditions riot in Gujarat State; five die in protests led by Patidars, who comprise about one fifth of state's population, and who seek share of government jobs and schools given to similar minorities.
lead_paragraph: New clashes erupted Wednesday in western India as the law enforcement tried to quell riots led by members of a farming caste demanding government benefits.

headline.main: India: Protesters Demand Jobs and Aid
headline.print_headline: Asia; India: Protesters Demand Jobs and Aid

snippet: New clashes erupted Wednesday in western India as the law enforcement tried to quell riots led by members of a farming caste demanding government benefits.
